author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

With the changes in bigly, one can run the analyzers, filters in the same step of simulation. The configuration files are updated accordingly

#### PR validation:

Tested with private runs. They are not affecting any production workflows

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-TB39 Update the cfg files, now that the analyzers work with simulation
